item.title: Debug Shell in VSCode
item.author: serialt
item.description: Debug shell 1、安装插件 安装bashdb插件 rogalmic.bash-debug 2、增加一个vscode launch.json配置文件 Select Debug -> Add Configuration to add custom debug configuration 示例： { "configurations": [ { "type": "bashdb", "request": "launch", "name": "Bash-Debug", "cwd":
